description: Sample COI data for testing AI extraction and validation

samples.description: Standard ACORD 25 - General Contractor with full coverage
samples.raw_text_simulation:
CERTIFICATE OF LIABILITY INSURANCE
DATE (MM/DD/YYYY): 01/15/2024

THIS CERTIFICATE IS ISSUED AS A MATTER OF INFORMATION ONLY AND CONFERS NO RIGHTS UPON THE CERTIFICATE HOLDER.

INSURED:
ABC Construction Services LLC
123 Builder Street
Anytown, ST 12345

INSURER A: National Insurance Company
POLICY NUMBER: GL-2024-001234

TYPE OF INSURANCE: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY
POLICY EFF (MM/DD/YYYY): 01/01/2024
POLICY EXP (MM/DD/YYYY): 01/01/2025

EACH OCCURRENCE: $1,000,000
DAMAGE TO RENTED PREMISES: $100,000
MED EXP: $5,000
PERSONAL & ADV INJURY: $1,000,000
GENERAL AGGREGATE: $2,000,000
PRODUCTS-COMP/OP AGG: $2,000,000

AUTOMOBILE LIABILITY
COMBINED SINGLE LIMIT: $1,000,000

UMBRELLA LIAB: $5,000,000 EACH OCCURRENCE
AGGREGATE: $5,000,000

WORKERS COMPENSATION AND EMPLOYERS LIABILITY
E.L. EACH ACCIDENT: $1,000,000
E.L. DISEASE - EA EMPLOYEE: $1,000,000
E.L. DISEASE - POLICY LIMIT: $1,000,000

DESCRIPTION OF OPERATIONS: General contracting services. Certificate holder is included as additional insured per written contract.

CERTIFICATE HOLDER:
XYZ Property Management
456 Main Street
Anytown, ST 12345

ADDITIONAL INSURED: X
WAIVER OF SUBROGATION: X

expected_extraction.certificate_holder: XYZ Property Management, 456 Main Street, Anytown, ST 12345
expected_extraction.description_of_operations: General contracting services. Certificate holder is included as additional insured per written contract.

samples.description: Cleaning service - No auto coverage needed
samples.raw_text_simulation:
CERTIFICATE OF LIABILITY INSURANCE
ISSUE DATE: 02/10/2024

NAMED INSURED:
Sparkle Clean Services
222 Mop Street, Suite 100
Cleantown, ST 33333

INSURANCE COMPANY: SafeGuard Mutual
POLICY: SG-CLEAN-2024-222

COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY
POLICY PERIOD: 02/01/2024 TO 02/01/2025

LIMITS:
EACH OCCURRENCE: $1,000,000
GENERAL AGGREGATE: $2,000,000
PRODUCTS/COMPLETED OPS: $1,000,000
PERSONAL INJURY: $1,000,000

NO AUTOMOBILE LIABILITY - NOT APPLICABLE

WORKERS COMPENSATION: STATUTORY LIMITS
EMPLOYERS LIABILITY: $500,000

ADDITIONAL INSURED: YES - AS PER WRITTEN CONTRACT
WAIVER OF SUBROGATION APPLIES

CERTIFICATE HOLDER:
Corporate Office Park
1000 Business Center Blvd
Cleantown, ST 33333

samples.description: Security company - High limits with umbrella
samples.raw_text_simulation:
ACORD CERTIFICATE OF LIABILITY INSURANCE
DATE: 01/20/2024

PRODUCER:
Insurance Brokers Inc.

INSURED:
Guardian Security Services Corp
999 Patrol Ave
Safetown, ST 77777

INSURER A: Elite Insurance Company (A+ Rated)
INSURER B: Umbrella Specialists Inc.

GENERAL LIABILITY - INSURER A
POLICY: EIC-GL-2024-999
EFF: 01/01/2024  EXP: 01/01/2025
EACH OCCURRENCE: $2,000,000
DAMAGE TO RENTED PREMISES: $300,000
MEDICAL EXPENSE: $10,000
PERSONAL & ADV INJURY: $2,000,000
GENERAL AGGREGATE: $4,000,000
PRODUCTS-COMP/OP: $4,000,000

AUTOMOBILE LIABILITY - INSURER A
POLICY: EIC-AUTO-2024-999
COMBINED SINGLE LIMIT: $2,000,000

UMBRELLA LIABILITY - INSURER B
POLICY: USI-UMB-2024-999
EACH OCCURRENCE: $10,000,000
AGGREGATE: $10,000,000

WORKERS COMPENSATION - INSURER A
POLICY: EIC-WC-2024-999
STATUTORY
E.L. EACH ACCIDENT: $1,000,000
E.L. DISEASE-EA EMPLOYEE: $1,000,000
E.L. DISEASE-POLICY LIMIT: $1,000,000

DESCRIPTION:
Unarmed security guard services for commercial properties.
Certificate holder is named as additional insured.
Waiver of subrogation applies in favor of certificate holder.

CERTIFICATE HOLDER:
Luxury Mall Properties LLC
5000 Shopping Center Way
Safetown, ST 77777

expected_extraction.certificate_holder: Luxury Mall Properties LLC, 5000 Shopping Center Way, Safetown, ST 77777
expected_extraction.description_of_operations: Unarmed security guard services for commercial properties. Certificate holder is named as additional insured. Waiver of subrogation applies in favor of certificate holder.

edge_cases.description: Poor quality scan with OCR errors
edge_cases.raw_text_simulation:
CERTIF1CATE 0F L1AB1LITY 1NSURANCE

1NSURED: Qu4lity Plumbing Svcs
P0LICY: QP-2O24-1111
EXP1RES: O3/15/2O25
GL L1MIT: $1,OOO,OOO
edge_cases.notes: Test OCR correction capability - 0/O and 1/I substitutions

edge_cases.raw_text_simulation:
CERTIFICATE OF INSURANCE

INSURED: Mystery Contractor

GENERAL LIABILITY: $1,000,000

CERTIFICATE HOLDER: ABC Company
edge_cases.notes: Test handling of incomplete certificates - should flag for review

edge_cases.raw_text_simulation:
CERTIFICATE OF LIABILITY INSURANCE

INSURED: Multi-Policy Corp

INSURER A: First Insurance Co - Policy A-111 - GL $1M - Exp 01/01/2025
INSURER B: Second Insurance Co - Policy B-222 - AUTO $1M - Exp 03/01/2025
INSURER C: Third Insurance Co - Policy C-333 - WC Statutory - Exp 02/01/2025
edge_cases.notes: Test handling of multiple insurers - use earliest expiration for tracking
